en-US.summary: Ask Alexa when to begin your next commute
examplePhrases: Alexa, ask TransitBuddy to check bus 151 at one one zero eight
Alexa, ask TransitBuddy to get my bus
Alexa, ask TransitBuddy to get preset 2
en-US.name: TransitBuddy
en-US.description:
TransitBuddy helps you get the estimated arrival time of your Chicago CTA buses. Simply ask this question:

Alexa... ask TransitBuddy to check bus 151 from stop 1108

For a list of stops, visit the CTA bus website. http://www.transitchicago.com/riding_cta/systemguide/buses.aspx

For even more simplicity, you can save your bus number and stop number to multiple presets. We updated this skill to provide you a beautiful user interface for adding your presets. Please visit mytransitbuddy.com to create an account and link to this TransitBuddy Alexa skill.

You can quickly retrieve the bus information with this command:

"Alexa... ask TransitBuddy to get my bus"
"Alexa... ask TransitBuddy to get my bus for preset 2"

For questions and suggestions for this skill, please email us at yzdevelopment@yahoo.com.

Credits:
Icon made by Freepik from www.flaticon.com
en-US.updatesDescription: A brand new interface for adding your bus presets. Visit mytransitbuddy.com to create an account and link to your TransitBuddy Alexa skill.
